xml:
Renvela<tm tmtype="reg"/> 800mg tablets (Sanofi) Indications and dose

Hyperphosphataemia in patients on haemodialysis or peritoneal dialysis

Hyperphosphataemia in patients with chronic kidney disease not on dialysis who have a serum-phosphate concentration of 1.78 mmol/litre or more

By mouth

  • Adult

    Initially 2.4–4.8 g daily in 3 divided doses, dose to be taken with meals and adjusted according to serum-phosphate concentration every 2–4 weeks; usual dose 6 g daily in 3 divided doses.

 Breast feeding

Unlikely to be present in milk (however, manufacturer advises avoid).
Directions for administration

For powder for oral supension, each sachet to be dispersed in 60 mL water.
Clinical medicinal product information Clinical medicinal product information
